titleStmt.title: Papers of the desires of the souldiers of the army, dated June 9. at the generall randezvouzes at New-market. Also some passages concerning the King, and His Majesties resolution, and of the proceedings of those who attend His Majesty, by order of both Houses of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Corbet, Roger.

titleStmt.title: Papers of the desires of the souldiers of the army, dated June 9. at the generall randezvouzes at New-market. Also some passages concerning the King, and His Majesties resolution, and of the proceedings of those who attend His Majesty, by order of both Houses of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Corbet, Roger.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: Newmarket June 9. 1647. R. Corbet.
The final digit of the imprint date has failed to print.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "June 10th"; the imprint date is completed as 164"7".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
